alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 9:10PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...BRIEF STRONG GUSTY WINDS WILL CONTINUE ALONG INTERSTATE 25 NEAR BORDEAUX... Current observations around Mile Marker 75 at Bordeaux show west to southwest winds occasionally gusting between 50 to 60 MPH late this evening. These winds are expected to continue through midnight before a cold front drifts west towards the Interstate 25 corridor around sunrise...which will result in diminishing winds. Motorists traveling along Interstate 25 between Douglas and Cheyenne are urged to use caution between Mile Markers 65 and 75 north of Chugwater and south of Wheatland. Be prepared for sudden wind gusts, especially if traveling in light and high profile vehicles including campers and tractor trailers.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County
